definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: He released his hand and sat down in the chair, fuming.
sentences.chinese: 他一把放手，氣鼓鼓坐在那張椅子裏。

sentences.english: "Engines are much faster than buses, " huffed Thomas.
sentences.chinese: “火車當然比巴士快很多了”托馬斯氣鼓鼓的說。

sentences.english: She huffed off the house when her mother scolded her.
sentences.chinese: 她母親責罵她時，她氣鼓鼓地離開了家。

sentences.english: Then, he huffed lying in bed, covered his head with the quilt.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他氣鼓鼓地倒在牀上，用被子矇住了頭。

sentences.english: Hanging up on us is a surefire way to make sure we go to bed mad.
sentences.chinese: 掛我們的電話肯定會讓我們氣鼓鼓地睡覺。
